Title: John, Cougar, Newman Camp
Plot: The second season finale focuses on Bobby's wedding rehearsal. Bobby reveals his choice for a "best men" and Mike makes discoveries about Maggie. Meanwhile, PJ hopes to repair the damage between Bobby and Jack, and PJ and her boys discuss how the status quo will be upset by Bobby's marriage.
GuestStars: Billy Burke, Mini Anden, Mimi Rogers, Christopher McDonald, Adrian Wenner, Marilu Henner
